title: In cases plotted layout where layout is submitted along with proposed Development Plan Road, in such
clause_text: In cases plotted layout where layout is submitted along with proposed Development Plan Road, in such cases TDR shall not be permissible for the width of road that would be necessary according to the length as per these Regulations; If the compensation in the form of FSI / or by any means has already been granted to the owner. Where lawful possession including by mutual agreement /or contract has been taken.
section: 3.0 CASES NOT ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS ( TDR ):-
